// get formatted date and time from Date object
export var getDate=function getDate(pre){var dt=new Date(pre);return"".concat(("0"+(dt.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2),"/").concat(dt.getDate(),"/").concat(dt.getFullYear());};export var getTime=function getTime(pre){var dt=new Date(pre);var suffix="AM";var hours=dt.getHours();if(hours>=12){hours=hours%12;suffix="PM";}if(hours===0){hours=12;}return"".concat(("0"+hours).slice(-2),":").concat(("0"+dt.getMinutes()).slice(-2)," ").concat(suffix);};
